downloadTitle: Design Sample: Extranet with Dedicated Zones for Authentication for SharePoint 2013
downloadDescription: This design sample illustrates many top-level project sites with vanity URLs by using host-named sites for each project site (instead of organizing project sites underneath a top-level site collection).
detailsSection: This design sample illustrates many top-level project sites with vanity URLs by using host-named sites for each project site (instead of organizing project sites underneath a top-level site collection). One advantage of using host-named site collections in this manner is creating additional isolation between domain URLs, which might be desired in a partner collaboration solution. However, the tradeoff of this approach is the additional costs of managing a greater number of host names, including managing SSL certificates. Also, if SAML authentication is used, additional configuration is required.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Visio 2010, Adobe Portable Document File Reader
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
